stl:story.name: Main
stl:story.stl:p: Full alignment paragraph - this is a default alignment in StoryTeller. It is probably most esthetic for paragraphs containing several lines of text. On the other hand - paragraphs containing just a single line of text are indistinguishable from simple left-aligned paragraphs.
This paragraph has custom indent definitions, 'left-indent', 'right-indent' and 'first-indent' (interpreted relatively to the left).
This paragraph has a custom 'space-before' and 'space-after' attributes.
And this paragraph has a custom 'line-spacing' set to value 1.5 and 'line-spacing-mode' set to 'relative'.
And this paragraph has 'keep-with-next' set to 1.
And this paragraph has widow & orphan control. It's 'keep-together-first' and 'keep-together-last' attributes are set to 3 lines.
